items.title: Raw Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, red cabbage, tomatoes, onions, carrots, and walnuts topped with a spicy kimchi. Served with homemade vinaigrette.

items.title: Cranberry Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, tomato, onions, carrots, avocado and apples. Served with homemade vinaigrette.

items.title: House Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, red cabbage, tomato, onions, carrots and avocado. Served with our homemade vinaigrette.

items.title: Chickpea and Avocado Sandwich
items.description: This chickpea and avocado sandwich is packed with protein and full of cilantro, celery, dill, green onion and lime. Served with organic corn chips.

items.title: BBQ Cauliflower Sandwich
items.description: Oven-baked cauliflower breaded in rice crumbs and smothered in house BBQ sauce served with slaw on choice of bread. Served with organic blue chips.

items.title: Corn & Peas Sandwich
items.description: A delicious assortment of green peas, golden corns and crunchy dices of carrot , blended in a creamy mixture of v-mayo sauce.

items.title: Reuben Sandwich with Cashew Cheese
items.description: These Veggie Reuben Sandwiches are made with cashew cheese, sauerkraut and crisp veggies, all layered on pumpernickel bread. Served with organic corn chips.

items.title: Leafy's Burger
items.description: A sweet potato, French lentil and kale burger, topped with avocado, tomato, mixed greens and onions, served with our cilantro-curry mayo on a square parker bun. Served with organic corn chips

items.title: The Tuna Sandwich
items.description: Jackfruit and chickpeas v-tuna salad, fresh organic spices, carrots, celery, served with mixed greens, tomato, avocado, onions and melted v-cheddar cheese on choice of bread. Served with organic corn chips.

items.title: Beyond Beef Burger
items.description: Burger prepared to honor its mythical meaty predecessor topped with sauteed onions, mixed greens, tomato, avocado, v-mayo, and our special sauce. Served with organic corn chips.

items.title: The Veggie Wrap
items.description: Organic greens, tomato, avocado, mozzarella style V-cheeze, veggies with our homemade vinaigrette rolled in a warm spinach wrap.

items.title: Mexican Patty Wrap
items.description: A refreshing filling of red and black kidney beans patty, topped with aromatic Mexican seasoning to spice up your palette.

items.title: Bandito Loco Wrap
items.description: Spicy chorizo, sauteed veggies topped with salsa, and melted mozzarella-style V-cheeze. Served in a warm spinach wrap with fresh greens, tomato, avocado and a touch of creamy vinaigrette.

items.title: Custom Smoothie
